title: Is there a script available to create this L anywhere? Photoshop, Illustrator?
content:
I need this "L" and I'm trying to see how to create it.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo-(3).JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140721210507/http:/typophile.com/files/photo-(3)_0.JPG) | 11.17 KB |
author: dream2life

comments.content: no, but it would be easy to create in Illustrator. Find an L that is somewhat close, convert to outlines and manipulate as needed.

The golden "L" in "Legendary" is not identical to the "L" in "L'auberge".

You can find both on page 105 of the "Welcome Baton Rouge visitor's guide" ( [pdf 49MB](http://web.archive.org/web/20140721210507/http:/www.visitbatonrouge.com/userfiles/file/Visit%20Baton%20Rouge%20Welcome%20Guide%202013.pdf))
